title: The war on the press escalates
description: The media has been Donald Trump’s favorite scapegoat for a decade now, and as the president confronts the return of political gravity and the inevitable weakening of his hold on power, he will lash out — and no better target than journalists. Some of these attacks will be familiar: We’ve seen how litigation warfare can...
